thread.title: RENTRAK CORPORATION SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. Announces Investigation Of Buyout - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: RENTRAK CORPORATION SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. Announces Investigation Of Buyout - Yahoo Finance

author: Rigrodsky & Long, P.A.
title: RENTRAK CORPORATION SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. Announces Investigation Of Buyout - Yahoo Finance
text:
WILMINGTON, Del., Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Rigrodsky & Long, P.A.:
Do you own shares of Rentrak Corporation (NASDAQ GS: RENT )? Did you purchase any of your shares prior to September 29, 2015? Do you think the proposed buyout value is too low? Do you want to discuss your rights? Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. announces that it is investigating potential legal claims against the board of directors of Rentrak Corporation ("Rentrak" or the "Company") (NASDAQ GS: RENT) regarding possible breaches of fiduciary duties and other violations of law related to the Company's entry into an agreement to be acquired by comScore, Inc. ("comScore") (NASDAQ GS: SCOR).
Click here to learn more: http://rigrodskylong.com/investigations/rentrak-corporation-rent .
Under the terms of the agreement, shareholders of Rentrak will receive 1.15 shares comScore for each share of Rentrak they own. Based on comScore's closing price on September 28, 2015, Rentrak shareholders would have received compensation valued at approximately $49.62 per share.
The investigation concerns whether Rentrak's board of directors failed to adequately shop the Company and obtain the best possible value for Rentrak's shareholders before entering into an agreement with comScore. According to Yahoo! Finance, at least one analyst has issued a price target for Rentrak stock at $100.00 per share . 
If you own the common stock of Rentrak and purchased your shares before September 29, 2015, if you have information or would like to learn more about these claims, or if you wish to discuss these matters or have any questions concerning this announcement or your rights or interests with respect to these matters, please contact Seth D. Rigrodsky or Gina M. Serra at Rigrodsky & Long, P.A., 2 Righter Parkway, Suite 120, Wilmington, DE 19803, by telephone at (888) 969-4242; by e-mail to info@rl-legal.com , or at: http://rigrodskylong.com/investigations/rentrak-corporation-rent .
Rigrodsky & Long, P.A. , with offices in Wilmington, Delaware and Garden City, New York, regularly prosecutes securities class, derivative and direct actions, shareholder rights litigation and corporate governance litigation , on behalf of shareholders in states and federal courts throughout the United States.
Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee a similar outcome.
